title: GRACE: Graph-Based Contextual Debiasing for Fair Visual Question Answering (Supplementary Materials)
details: Y Zhang, M Jiang, Q Zhao
abstract: In our main paper, we have presented GRACE, a novel approach addressing biases in knowledge-based VQA. It surpasses current debiasing methods, which primarily tackle dataset biases but fall short in handling biases within the incontext learning …
